sentence.Network_en: Northerly winds will increase to force six by midday.

entry.def: A northerly point, area, or direction is to the north or towards the north.

example.ex: Unst is the most northerly island in the British Isles...

example.ex: I wanted to go a more northerly route across Montana.

entry.def: A northerly wind is a wind that blows from the north.

means.word_mean: 1. situated in or oriented toward the north;
2. coming from the north; used especially of wind;
